titleStmt.title: A letter sent to Thomas Taylor, Quaker, in the year 1664 in answer to many blasphemous sayings of his in several pieces of paper and in the margent of a book ... / by Lodowick Muggleton.
titleStmt.author: Muggleton, Lodowick, 1609-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
